ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmatring.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |

| 4 |  | pmat1op.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` P ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( R e. Ring -> P e. Ring ) |
| 6 | 2, 4, 3 | #P_mat1 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ P e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` C ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` C ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> if ( i = j , .1. , .0. ) ) ) |
